title: Pisces and Taurus Compatibility: Love, Sex, and More

steps.title: Taurus and Pisces make one of the sweetest matches of the zodiac.
steps.content: Taurus and Pisces make one of the sweetest matches of the zodiac. Pisces’ emotional intuition will make Taurus feel truly understood, while Taurus’s stability will make Pisces feel safe and protected. They may struggle to balance Taurus's stubbornness and Pisces' need for change, but overall, Taurus and Pisces have a lot of potential together. [1] X Research source Pisces is a mutable water sign. A Pisces partner is creative, dreamy, sensitive, and romantic. Taurus is a fixed earth sign. A Taurus partner will be practical, dependable, hard-working, and sensual. [2] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021.

steps.title: Both signs appreciate creativity and beauty.
steps.content: Both signs appreciate creativity and beauty. They may show appreciation differently; down-to-earth Taurus loves material goods and the finer things in life, while Pisces has their head in the clouds looking for inspiration and new ways to express themselves artistically. Still, a Pisces-Taurus home will be comfy, beautiful, and filled with good food and crafts they've made together. Food is the way to a Taurus's heart. [3] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. If Pisces channels some creativity into making Taurus's favorite dinner or coming up with delicious snacks try, Taurus will be totally hooked. Taurus can use their love of luxury to make Pisces feel happy and satisfied. Scented oils and a sensual massage are right up this water sign's alley!

steps.title: Intimacy between these signs is gentle and satisfying.
steps.content: Intimacy between these signs is gentle and satisfying. Ruled by Venus (astrology's planet of love), Taurus will give their all to Pisces in and out of the bedroom. Pisces is also naturally romantic and extremely passionate, so Taurus will always feel loved and appreciated. Both signs will focus on the other's enjoyment, making them a giving and considerate couple. [4] X Research source Intimacy is important to Pisces and Taurus for the same reasons. They both want it to be a meaningful experience and neither is looking for a fling, so their sex life will be very rewarding!

steps.title: If Taurus lets the relationship become predictable, Pisces may get bored.
steps.content: If Taurus lets the relationship become predictable, Pisces may get bored. It's easy for stubborn and slow-moving Taurus to get stuck in their ways once they get comfortable. [5] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. As a mutable sign, Pisces likes to change things up and may get frustrated with Taurus's lack of flexibility—both in the bedroom and when planning dates. Still, this is an issue that both partners can easily overcome if they communicate their needs and reach a compromise. For example, structured and planned date nights could satisfy a Taurus's need for stability and comfort. Changing up the location of those dates could give Pisces the excitement and variety they crave!

steps.title: Pisces and Taurus share a kind, nurturing nature.
steps.content: Pisces and Taurus share a kind, nurturing nature. Pisces will love the comfort and stability of being with a Taurus. While Taurus can appear stoic on the outside, they have a warm and emotional core that Pisces will adore. Meanwhile, romantic Pisces can make Taurus feel completely accepted and cherished, leading to a long and loving relationship between these two signs.

steps.title: Taurus may take time to let their guard down.
steps.content: Taurus may take time to let their guard down. This more introverted sign has a small social circle and does not expand it often. [6] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. Luckily, Pisces has all the tools to get Taurus to open up a little. Pisces is sensitive and has no trouble talking about their feelings—and once Pisces makes Taurus feel comfortable and appreciated, a Taurus partner will eagerly follow suit.

steps.title: These signs balance each other out, making communication easy.
steps.content: These signs balance each other out, making communication easy. A Taurus-Pisces pair often don't even have to speak—they have an innate understanding of one another and can read body language like pros. This couple is adept at overcoming problems together; because they make each other feel safe and secure, they won't hesitate to talk things out when needed! Fixed Taurus is happy to take the lead in the relationship, and mutable Pisces is happy to go with the flow and come along for the ride. Pisces can be vague and indecisive, but Taurus's patience will help them stick around and work through it.

steps.title: Pisces can be evasive, which may impact Taurus’s ability to trust them.
steps.content: Pisces can be evasive, which may impact Taurus’s ability to trust them. This sign sometimes avoids making commitments—not because they don't care about Taurus, but because they just might not be in the mood for a relationship. However, Pisces' evasiveness often makes Taurus feel insecure about their relationship. If Pisces and Taurus can work together and use those top-notch communication skills to voice their desires, they can get past rough patches at the beginning of the relationship. Taurus may need to step up and fight for the relationship if Pisces starts to pull away. Ever the romantic, Pisces can't resist a partner who wants to stand by them no matter what. Reader Poll: We asked 706 wikiHow readers what their biggest dealbreaker is as a Pisces and 62% of them said someone who lies. [Take Poll] However, it’s important for them to be honest and upfront, as well!

steps.title: Despite potential issues, Pisces and Taurus make a soulmate-level match.
steps.content: Despite potential issues, Pisces and Taurus make a soulmate-level match. They have similar expectations and needs from a long-term romance, and when they make an effort to truly understand each other, their partnership will flourish. Few signs love as deeply as these two, and their devotion to one another can help them face any challenge.
